content.rendered:
This 8 Switch slimline switch Panel Control System is a must for any 4×4. If you want to switch any more than one light and or accessory in your cabin this will massively simplify your wiring. It will also you only ever have to pass one small cable through your firewall. After that, any additional item you want to switch can be done with a simple two core wire from under your bonnet directly to the item. No additional switches, fuses, relays or wiring required. Its an amazing product and you will be kicking yourself you did not install it when you first started adding accessories to your car. Not only this but our controller includes a high beam input not seen on anything else. This enables you to select two channels that are only enabled if your high beam is on. This allows you to use it for driving lights so that when you dip your beam teh driving lights will also torn off. This is a legal requirement when installing forward facing lights and will again really simplify your wiring.

The switch decals are fully customization and its supplied with a decal sheet for you to choose from. This makes using the panel in your vehicle super simple also. the Auto dimming back light ensures you can see the buttons super clear during  the day and it dims at night to ensure its not in your face. This kit includes everything you need to install it without having to make up cables or brackets. All cables supplied are already terminated and fully plug and play. The panel mounting brackets supplied give you the ability to flush mount or you can use the supplied adjustable angle mounting bracket.

All the channels are protected by integrated fuses and controlled by fully sealed solid state relays. This means no more dodgy wiring and mechanical relays causing you troubles when you need t most. These things will last forever.

  • 8 gang switch panel
  • Ambient sensing back lit display
  • High beam input
  • Solid state relays
  • In built fuses
  • Spares fuses included in lid
  • Die cast alloy base
  • Up to 30A output per channel
  • 60A circuit braker included
  • Plug and play harness for install
  • Adjustable angle and flush mount brackets included
  • Switch stickers supplied to cover every need in your 4×4

excerpt.rendered:
TRAILMAX 8 LIGHT Switch slimline Panel

 

If “OUT  OF  STOCK” please enquire.
